references.paper_title: Monitor-guided decoding of code LMs with static analysis of repository context
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it explores the use of static analysis with LLMs for code generation, addressing the challenges faced with low-resource programming languages.

references.paper_title: Program synthesis with large language models
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field, demonstrating the abilities and limitations of LLMs in code generation tasks that directly influence the success of the approach described in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Knowledge transfer from high-resource to low-resource programming languages for code LLMs
references.reason: This paper investigates a similar problem to the target paper and provides a comparative approach that strengthens the justification for the proposed technique.

references.paper_title: Evaluating large language models trained on code
references.reason: This is a fundamental work in the evaluation of LLMs for code generation; it provides critical metrics that were used to assess performance in the target paper.
This paper provides the theoretical foundation for the SMT solving used in the proposed approach, a core component of the method described.
